page.description: Sets the foreground color for some types of controls

argument.name: Foreground_Color
argument.description: Character. The name of an Alpha Anywhere color (see A5.COLOR_ENUM()). Defines the text color of a control.

argument.name: Background_Color
argument.description: Character. The name of an Alpha Anywhere color (see A5.COLOR_ENUM()). Defines the background color of a textbox control.
